views.markdown:
Compatible with iOS 10 and 11

KillBackground9 users are free.

This package based "KillBackground" by Mr.Mathieu Bolard (mattlawer).

A simple but useful tweak to kill all background apps. Adds special buttons to the AppSwitcher view.

You can also operate from the Control Center without buttons.
(Using Flipswitch or CCsupport)

- Option -

Auto Close Switcher: Will close the switcher after execution.
Button on the left: Will place the button to the left.
Big Buttons: Will place a large button to the left and right.

Kill Music: Music will terminate the application even during playback.
Exclude apps: The selected application can not kill.

Use Legacy button: Use the previous icon.
Hide buttons: It is used when you want to use Flipswitch etc...

Button Height-Width: It will adjust the position of the button.
(It is not valid in the case of Big Buttons)

URL scheme at the end: If run the button long press, Run the URL scheme at the end.
(ex. Memory cleaner app)

Flipswitch and CCSupport is not depend. If you want to use, please install.

Configure options from Settings app.

Support: Meridian Jailbreak Add: it possible to change the position of BigButtons on iOS 11. New Icon design v1.1.1
Fix: Minor Issue
Add: Hide AppSwitcher Banner (iOS 11)
Hide Switcher App Suggestion Banner (Such as headphone connection)
Add: ControlCenter's long press function (iOS 11)
Execute URL scheme (Open settings if there is no setting)
v1.1.0
Support: iOS 10 to 11.3.1
Added: ControlCneter toggle
(Please install CCSupport)
